messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]Freaky Friday
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: SandraDodd@aol.com **Holly saw a sneak preview last night and got a free t-shirt.  She was not prepared to like it, out of loyalty to the older
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: SandraDodd@...

**Holly saw a "sneak preview" last night and got a free t-shirt. She was not
prepared to like it, out of loyalty to the older version, but she LOVED it.**
Ditto for me.

I really was only going for the girls, they wanted to go.

I remember going to the original when I was like 10 or 12 yrs old. I shared with the girls that it was so popular and the theater was so packed that I didn't get to sit with whoever it was that I went with. Which was kind-of weird for me at that age.

I really liked the new one too. It surprised me.

Now we are going to bunk down in the basement and watch the old one. Boy does it bring back memories!

We had a great day. :)

Kelli~
